lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : MONAHAN, PAT/LIND, ESPEN/BJORKLUND, AMUND
[00:14.200]My heart is paralyzed
[00:17.870]My head was oversized
[00:21.430]I'll take the high road like I should
[00:27.970]You said it's meant to be
[00:31.640]That it's not you, it's me
[00:34.990]You're leaving now for my own good
[00:41.400]That's cool, but if my friends ask where you are I'm gonna say
[00:44.600]She went down in an airplane
[00:46.750]Fried getting suntan
[00:48.510]Fell in a cement mixer full of quicksand
[00:51.740]Help me, help me,
[00:53.310]I'm no good at goodbyes!
[00:58.010]She met a shark under water
[01:00.400]Fell and no one caught her
[01:02.270]I returned everything I ever bought her
[01:05.590]Help me, help me,
[01:07.050]I'm all out of lies
[01:10.370]And ways to say you died
[01:26.300]My pride still feels the sting
[01:29.860]You were my everything
[01:33.180]Some day I'll find a love like yours
[01:37.670](a love like yours)
[01:40.110]She'll think I'm Superman
[01:43.530]Not super minivan
[01:46.990]How could you leave on Yom Kippur?
[01:53.200]That's cool, but if my friends ask where you are I'm gonna say
[01:56.600]She was caught in a mudslide
[01:58.720]Eaten by a lion
[02:00.530]Got run over by a crappy purple Scion
[02:03.710]Help me, help me,
[02:05.360]I'm no good at goodbyes!
[02:10.020]She dried up in the desert
[02:12.350]Drown in a hot tub
[02:14.280]Danced to death at an east side night club
[02:17.460]Help me, help me,
[02:19.010]I'm all out of lies
[02:22.350]And ways to say you died
[02:37.920]I wanna live a thousand lives with you
[02:41.140]I wanna be the one you're dying to
[02:44.640]Love...爱...
[02:47.130]but you don't want to
[02:51.660]That's cool, but if my friends ask where you are I'm gonna say
[02:54.940]That's cool, but if my friends ask where you are I'm gonna say
[02:58.230]She went down in an airplane
[03:00.390]Fried getting suntan
[03:02.350]Fell in a cement mixer full of quicksand
[03:05.440]Help me, help me,
[03:07.020]I'm no good at goodbyes!
[03:11.560]She met a shark under water
[03:14.110]Fell and no one caught her
[03:15.960]I returned everything I ever bought her
[03:19.170]Help me, help me,
[03:20.800]I'm all out of lies
[03:25.790]She was caught in a mudslide
[03:27.740]Eaten by a lion
[03:29.580]Got run over by a crappy purple Scion
[03:32.910]Help me, help me,
[03:34.460]I'm no good at goodbyes!
[03:39.050]She dried up in the desert
[03:41.410]Drown in a hot tub
[03:43.380]Danced to death at an east side night club
[03:46.660]Help me, help me,
[03:48.140]I'm all out of lies
[03:51.350]And ways to say you die
tlyric:
[by:L_B_W_P]
[00:14.200]我的心已经麻痹
[00:17.870]我的头脑已经混乱不堪
[00:21.430]早知道我就该走捷径
[00:27.970]你曾说这是命中注定
[00:31.640]错误全在我而与你无关
[00:34.990]分手倒是为我着想
[00:41.400]这样是很潇洒,但若我的朋友问及你的去处,我会这么说
[00:44.600]她乘的飞机坠毁了
[00:46.750]晒日光浴时被烤焦了
[00:48.510]坠入装满泥沙的水泥搅拌机里
[00:51.740]帮帮我,帮帮我
[00:53.310]我从来都不擅长分手
[00:58.010]她在水里碰到了鲨鱼
[01:00.400]落水了却无人能救她一命
[01:02.270]我退掉了买给她的所有纪念
[01:05.590]帮帮我,帮帮我
[01:07.050]我已编不出谎言
[01:10.370]无法想出你的死因
[01:26.300]我的自尊仍然感受着那种刺痛
[01:29.860]你曾是我的一切
[01:33.180]总有一天,我会找到像你一样的佳人
[01:37.670](像你一样的佳人)
[01:40.110]也许她会觉得我是她的超人
[01:43.530]而不是小面包车
[01:46.990]你怎能在赎罪日上离我而去
[01:53.200]这样是很潇洒,但若我的朋友问及你的去处,我会这么说
[01:56.600]她被泥石流埋实了
[01:58.720]被狮子吞了
[02:00.530]被一辆破紫塞恩车撞飞了
[02:03.710]帮帮我,帮帮我
[02:05.360]我从来不擅长分手
[02:10.020]她在沙漠里迷失了方向
[02:12.350]泡热水澡时溺死了
[02:14.280]在东区夜店跳到心力衰竭而死
[02:17.460]帮帮我,帮帮我
[02:19.010]我已编不出谎言
[02:22.350]无法想出更多你的死因
[02:37.920]我想和你过一辈子,今生今世永不分离
[02:41.140]我想要成为你宁死都爱着的人
[02:44.640]
[02:47.130]但你不想这样
[02:51.660]这样是很潇洒,但若我的朋友问及你的去处,我会这么说
[02:54.940]这样是很潇洒,但若我的朋友问及你的去处,我会这么说
[02:58.230]她乘的飞机坠毁了
[03:00.390]晒日光浴时被烤焦了

[03:32.910]帮帮我,帮帮我

[03:39.050]她在沙漠里迷失了方向
[03:41.410]泡热水澡时溺死了
[03:43.380]在东区夜店跳到心力衰竭而死
